sections.heading: Injunction3-731.InjunctionThe director may bring an action to enjoin the violation or threatened violation of any provision of this article in the superior court in the county in which the violation occurred or is about to occur
sections.text: Injunction3-731.InjunctionThe director may bring an action to enjoin the violation or threatened violation of any provision of this article in the superior court in the county in which the violation occurred or is about to occur.
